executable.title: DeepCell Plugin
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of efforts in digital pathology by the Sarder Lab: UFL.

region.name: input_region
region.label: Input Image Region
region.description: Select a rectangular region in the slide to run feature extraction on.

string.name: nuclei_frame
string.label: Nuclei Frame
string.description: Frame index to use for nuclei segmentation, use comma-separated list to combine frames

boolean.name: get_features
boolean.label: Get Features?
boolean.description: Calculate channel-level statistics for each nucleus

string-enumeration.name: method
string-enumeration.label: Segmentation Method
string-enumeration.description: What method to use to segment cells. Available options include DeepCell, CellPose, and Otsu's.

string-enumeration.name: post_processor
string-enumeration.label: Post-Processing Method
string-enumeration.description: Method to use to post-process raw predictions from the selected method. Available options include Watershed, Voronoi, or None.

parameters.label: Girder API URL and Key
parameters.description: A Girder API URL and token for Girder client

integer.name: patch_size
integer.label: Patch Size
integer.description: Size of patches to extract across selected region

integer.name: cyto_pixels
integer.label: Cytoplasm Pixels
integer.description: How many pixels to dilate cell segmentation masks for quantifying marker expression.

integer.name: approx_cell_radius
integer.label: Approximate Cell Radius
integer.description: Approximate cell radius to use when post-processing predictions

string.name: girderToken
string.label: Girder API Token
string.description: A Girder token identifying a user session
